A: 5.5
V: 7

Audio sounds tinny at max vol; picture is slightly blurry but decent. Overall, quality is not the best but still watchable if the audio doesn't annoy you too much. Can't compare to previous versions as I haven't watched them, so this might be a harsher scoring than it should. Thanks anyway, uploader
